page.title: 03CEIRIOG VALLEY TOURISM.
page.content: Many visitors come to our area as the Ceiriog valley is beautiful steep sided river country.Just outside Glyn Ceiriog there is a Pony trecking club. They do their training in a field opposite a road that goes through the valley.The fishing in the Ceiriog river is good, because just outside our area is a fishery, and the fish sometimes escape or are let out from there. Chwarel Wynne is a disused slate mine in Glyn Ceiriog and you can walk down the mine wearing a protective helmet. In the mines they have illustrations of how the people worked long ago. They have got a gift shop,a quarry museum and a small restaurant.
